channel.title: Hosting on some isp?
channel.description:
hey,
my ips is aol and i know people say your can get static ip =/ well mine hasent changed in a few days but i cant host my server of here iv done every thing people say and messed around with it my self and still "error connecting to server" -.- do you think aol are blocking it? even though my ports are open and it should be moving the connection to my pc.
any ideas?
The big Eak! =D

item.title: Hosting on some isp?
item.dc:creator: @mr_eak mr eak
item.description:
@mr_eak wrote:

well its looks all right to me =/ , i think its my no-ip cause iv port tested and they are find

if there a way to test my no-ip?

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting on some isp?
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

your isp shouldnt block incoming connections. More than likely you didnt get your static ip right. If you want to test try porting it through utorrent, that way it bypasses any ip problems

Read full topic
